title: Plum and ginger chutney
ingredients: ['1.35kg plums, stoned and halved', '450ml vinegar', '1 tablespoon salt', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '55g blanched almonds, finely chopped', '900g caster sugar', '450g raisins, finely chopped', '225g stem ginger, finely chopped']
